parameters.query:
=SELECT Id,
       FirstName,
       LastName,
       Email,
       Birthdate,
       Hire_Date__c,
       Title,
       Active__c,
       RecordType.DeveloperName,
       Birthday_or_Anniversary_today__c,
       Preferred_Name__c,
       Preferences__c,
       Preferred_Cake_Flavor__c,
       Preferred_Pizza_Flavor__c,
       Sweet_or_salty__c,
       Allergies_or_food_aversions__c
FROM Contact
WHERE RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NS_Employee'
  AND Active__c = true

nodes.name: Select all Contacts with birthdays or work anniversaries

main.node: Select all Contacts with birthdays or work anniversaries
